Original: For us Imperial knights, the drive
blade granted by our emperor is our
life. We need no other weapon.
Doing battle with the single drive
blade is very important to the dignity
...No, I'm just trying to sound cool.
The truth is, a drive blade's too
heavy to carry anything else with it.
But hey, it's still a sword, and it
works for any standard sword skills.
